title: Prepr Labs Homepage & Dashboard Clone
desc: A semi-functional clone of the Prepr Labs dashboard. Functionalities include: login with predefined credentials, dark and light mode, create dummy projects that can be seen on the dashboard

title: Xenon Landing Page
desc: A landing page I developed and helped design for a concept wellness app.

title: Space Tourism Website
desc: A multi-page react website to promote space tourism. A Frontend Mentor challange, where I needed to create the website as close to the provided wireframes as possible, along with all functionality and effects

title: Personal Website V1
desc: Created at the start of 2022, this is my first portfolio website. Nothing too fancy, just a static webpage.

title: ASP.NET Portfolio Builder
tech: ASP.net, Razor Pages, SQL LocalDB, Entity Framework
desc: A website where users can build up a portfolio of their projects. Uses cookie based authentication for admin login in order to perform CRUD operations, such as adding, editing and deleting projects.

title: Url Shrinker Service
desc: A Website along with an API that shortens URL links

title: Google Keep Clone
desc: A simple Google Keep clone built with React

title: Blog Website
desc: Blog website that allows for viewing, creating, and deleting posts. Posts are stored on MongoDB Atlas

title: ToDo List
tech: Node.js, Express, Javascript, EJS, MongoDB, CSS
desc: Your run of the mill ToDo list app. Allows for additional custom lists. All lists and list items are stored on MongoDB Atlas.
